Package com.sucy.skill.listener

Class BarListener

java.lang.Object
com.sucy.skill.listener.SkillAPIListener
com.sucy.skill.listener.BarListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class BarListener extends SkillAPIListener
Handles interactions with skill bars. This shouldn't be use by other plugins as it is handled by the API.
